159
REVOKING A WILL IN COURT
(1) A testator may revoke his or her will in court.
(2) The provisions of this Act that apply to the drawing up of a will in court shall, mutatis mutandis, also apply to the revocation of a will.
(3) If a testator revokes his or her will, the revocation shall be noted on a will deposited at court.
